PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08122013-06-13,  CH,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of MARLIE ODEN of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Patricia Anne McIver, effective July 30, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
